data.title: Prince Ferdinand, Duke of Surmetia

Prince Ferdinand, Duke of Surmetia (born 12 April 1982), is a oldest son and hier of King Michael II of Tikata.

Prince was born as oldest son and child of King and Queen of Tikata, he has one younger brother, Frederick (b. 1982) and two younger sisters, Anna Maria (b. 1985) and Tatiana (b. 1992).

He is first in line to the throne of Tikata. If he succeed his father as expected, he will be known as Ferdinand VI of Tikata.

Marriage

On 17 November 2012 he married, daughter of King Nicholas III of Territrius, Lana (b. 1983).

Children

On 7 September 2013 Royal Palace announced that Duchess and Duke of Surmetia are expecting their first child, second grandchild of King of Tikata and first of King of Territrius.[1] On 14 August 2016 it was announced that Duke and Duchess are expecting their second child in February 2017.

His Royal Highness Prince Oscar of Tikata, born on 1 March 2014.[2][3]

His Royal Highness Prince Philippe of Tikata, born on 10 February 2017.
